lead_paragraph: The uniforms were part of a shipment declared as “secondhand clothing” and were hidden inside three shipping containers intercepted in the ports of Valencia and Algeciras.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Spain: Uniforms for ISIS Seized
headline.main: Spain Seizes 20,000 Military Uniforms Bound for ISIS

snippet: The uniforms were part of a shipment declared as “secondhand clothing” and were hidden inside three shipping containers intercepted in the ports of Valencia and Algeciras.
abstract: Spanish authorities seize about 20,000 military uniforms and other military accessories that were to be shipped from ports in Valencia and Algeciras to fighters with Islamic State and other Islamist groups.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
